titleStmt.title: An essay upon the inscription of Macduff's crosse in Fyfe by I.C., 1678.
titleStmt.author: Cunningham, James, d. 1697?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: The ascription to James Carmichael cited in Lowndes II, 569, probably arises from confusion of names, written by James Cunningham. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in British Library.
